verses.name: Hebrews 10:14
verses.text: For by one offering he hath perfected for ever them that are sanctified.

verses.name: Hebrews 10:15
verses.text: Whereof the Holy Ghost also is a witness to us: for after that he had said before,

verses.name: Hebrews 10:16
verses.text: This is the covenant that I will make with them after those days, saith the Lord, I will put my laws into their hearts, and in their minds will I write them;

verses.name: Hebrews 10:17
verses.text: And their sins and iniquities will I remember no more.

verses.name: Hebrews 10:18
verses.text: Now where remission of these is, there is no more offering for sin.

verses.name: Hebrews 10:19
verses.text: Having therefore, brethren, boldness to enter into the holiest by the blood of Jesus,
